scripts.install:all: cd backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && bun install && bun run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && VITE_API_BASE_URL=http://34.56.225.220:3000 npm run build
scripts.gcp:build-code: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.gcp:build-image: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -f backend/Dockerfile -t paracal-backend . && docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t paracal-frontend ./frontend
scripts.gcp:tag: docker tag paracal-backend chtisanuphongcha/paracal-backend:latest && docker tag paracal-frontend chtisanuphongcha/paracal-frontend:latest
scripts.gcp:push: docker push chtisanuphongcha/paracal-backend:latest && docker push chtisanuphongcha/paracal-frontend:latest
scripts.gcp:release: npm run gcp:build-code && npm run gcp:build-image && npm run gcp:tag && npm run gcp:push
scripts.gcp:serve: docker compose -f docker-compose.gcp.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.gcp.yml pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.gcp.yml up -d
